data.title: In Living Memory
data.meta_description: WINNER  - 2023 Viet Film Fest  Spotlight Award NOMINATION  - 2023  Daytime Emmy in Shortform Program ( Asian American Stories of Resilience and Beyond )
data.text:
WINNER - 2023 Viet Film Fest Spotlight Award

NOMINATION - 2023 Daytime Emmy in Shortform Program (Asian American Stories of Resilience and Beyond)

After the closure of their mother’s nail salon at the onset of the COVID-19 pandemic, a queer filmmaker works with their mother to recover and articulate the legacy of the salon for their refugee family.

Director Quyên Nguyen-Le

Producer Kristy Choi

​Director of Photography Corey Cao Nguyen

Supervising Sound Designer & Editor xen nhà

Editors Nancy Nguyen & Quyên Nguyen-Le

In Living Memory - Trailers

Elsewhere
